channel.title: <<< Nirvanas Help Thread - Noones Question will be left Unanswered >>>
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i160.photobucket.com/albums/t167/nirvanasmarijuana/coollogo_com_176661480.gif[/img]
[size=13pt]Welcome to Nirvanas Help Thread.[/size]
Before posting a new topic rather post your question in here. Not only does it save forum space all questions are in 1 topic and none will fall through the cracks. I might add some FAQs on this top thread. I will post some Resources for learning Java too. Before posting make sure you are following the rules and the TOS which your agreed to follow.
[size=15pt]Note: DO NOT request code. DO NOT request tutorials.
Im not a walking tutorial DB [/size]
Learning Resources for Java:
[ul][li][url=http://pwnds.info/forums/index.php?topic=55.0]Sean Greasley Video Tutorials.[/url][/li] [li][url=http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/]The Official Java Tutorials.[/url][/li][/ul]
I strongly recomend downloading the whole Java Tutorial [url=http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorialNB/download/tutorial.zip]Here[/url] to make browsing quicker and you can still learn if your internet is down.
FAQ:
Question: How Do I Make Shops?
Answer: Open up shops.cfg in your server source in there you'll see a bunch of shops. The sytax for adding a new shop is: [code]shop = a b c d e f[/code]
a - the WanneShop number make it a number that is not already in your shops.cfg. b - Shop Name. - you can use colours like this: @red@, @gre@ ect. c - Sell - I think the shop sells for the item price * this int. d - Buy - Same as the Sell.. e - The item Id to add to the shop f - The amount of the item Id listed before it.
Note that you can add numerous slots of items in a shop like this: [code] shop = a b c d e f e f e f e f [/code]
Example: [code]shop = 24 Zeke's_Superior_Scimitars. 2 2 1321 5 1323 3 1325 2 1329 1[/code]
You then need to add it to your client.java so open it and look for: [code]else if(NPCID ==[/code]
The chances are you'll see this: [code]else if(NPCID == 599) { // Make over mage skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 14600; }[/code]
It doesnt matter if you dont see it but after the last } in the statement that pops up. (before the next else if)
Add this: [code]else if (NPCID == a) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = b; }[/code]
a - The Npc ID b - The shop Number you put in the first step of this. (a)
Well Post away..

item.dc:creator: @Evade Evade
item.description:
@Evade wrote:

I don’t know how to do the animation, but this should work to add the bar, exp and delete the ore:

public void iron(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(2351,1); deleteItem(440,getItemSlot(440),1); sendMessage("You make an iron bar."); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[13]), 13); actionName = "iron"; actionTimer = 10; startAnimation(0x383); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

Don’t think the animation wil work though…

item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

make a new method…

public void yourMethodName() { /**FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH OBJECT TYPE: 0-3 WALL OBJECTS, 4-8 WALL DECORATION, 9: DIAFG WALLS, 10-11 WORLD OBJECTS, 12-21: ROOFS, 22: FLOOR DECORATION*/ AddGlobalObj(X, Y, ID, FACE, TYPE); //For each new object add another line in here with the required data. }

Then under

case 121:

add

yourMethodName();

tuh duh…

@_Nirvana wrote:

[quote=“VBC3K, post:106, topic:132052”]ok, ive been playing on priv servers for like a year and for the past 8 months whenever i get on a private servers NO COMMANDS WILL WORK FOR ME

idk why its so annoying, not even if im a admin or mod on one

andyone help?[/quote]

You can only use commands if they are added to the server. Commands are not default for every server.

Ill Pk You:

You have to use an if statement in your spell. look for the hasitem boolean… and work it out.
